coreAndExtensionsNoteTemplate:
> [!NOTE]
> This command group has commands that are defined in both Azure CLI and at least one extension. Install each extension to benefit from its extended capabilities. [Learn more](https://learn.microsoft.com/cli/azure/azure-cli-extensions-overview) about extensions.
multipleExtensionsNoteTemplate:
> [!NOTE]
> This command group has commands that are defined in two or more extensions. Each extension will automatically install the first time you run an extension command. [Learn more](https://learn.microsoft.com/cli/azure/azure-cli-extensions-overview) about extensions.
extensionInformationTemplate:
> [!NOTE]
> This reference is part of the **{EXTENSION_NAME}** extension for the Azure CLI (version {MIN_CORE_VERSION} or higher). The extension will automatically install the first time you run an **{COMMAND_GROUP}** command. [Learn more](https://learn.microsoft.com/cli/azure/azure-cli-extensions-overview) about extensions.

az dla catalog tvf.PageTitle: Data Lake Analytics catalog table-valued functions

globalParameters.name: --debug
globalParameters.summary: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

globalParameters.name: --help -h
globalParameters.summary: Show this help message and exit.

globalParameters.name: --output -o
globalParameters.parameterValueGroup: json, jsonc, none, table, tsv, yaml, yamlc

globalParameters.name: --query
globalParameters.summary: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

globalParameters.name: --subscription
globalParameters.summary: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

globalParameters.name: --verbose
globalParameters.summary: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
